verses.roman:
prabhure mililā sarva vaiṣṇava āsiyā
jala-krīḍā kaila prabhu sabāre la-iyā

synonyms: prabhure—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mililā—met; sarva—all; vaiṣṇava—devotees; āsiyā—arriving at Jagannātha Purī; jala-krīḍā—sporting in the water; kaila—performed; prabhu—the Lord; sabāre—all the devotees; la-iyā—taking.
translation: After arriving at Jagannātha Purī, all the Vaiṣṇavas met with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Later, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sported in the water, taking all the devotees with Him.
